content: from the eye on the left and on the right and 2 stitches up fig 33 the top of ears should be sewn 12 st between fig 34 32 37 33 38 2 st 5 st sew the body to the head using the light 34 blue yarn the opening of the body should be sewn by going across each stitch of head and body fig 39 40 tight the thread well 41 use the pink embroidery thread embroider 39 the small nose 2 stitches length and 1 stitch height between the eyes fig 35 35 40 use the black thin thread embroider the mouth stitches height fig 36 two mustaches of 3 stitches length on both sides 7 last sew the tail on the back side of the 41 body fig 45 45 use a pin mark the middle stitch between rounds 24 and 25 count 4 stitches to the right and to the left sew the arms to the body the front corners of each arm should flower and lace be 8 stitches apart fig 43 use blue 261 and yellow 280 yarn in magic_ring chain 5 + slip_stitch x5 42 fasten_off sew the flower to the lace fig 46 lace chain 55 fasten_off turn the lace with flower around the neck and make one knot 46 43 44 sew the legs to the body the legs should be sewn between round 6 to 11 of the body fig 44 8
